item.title: The Benefits of Walking Barefoot on Grass (Earthing)
item.description: Feeling the cool, damp grass under my feet. A simple way to feel more connected and centered.

item.title: Morning Meditation Practice
item.description: Helps clear the mind and set a positive intention for the day. Consistency is the goal.
